lyrics:
3 contributorshoney come home lyricsverse 1 jonathan russell
honey come home
my stubborn ways are behind me now
theyre behind me now

verse 2 jonathan russell
and theres nothing here
that will not break down
like you never did

verse 3 jonathan russell  charity rose thielen
the kids say hello
to us in our separate homes

verse 4 jonathan russell  charity rose thielen
darlin please come home
ive cleaned out the fridge
wiped the counters off
and put away my clothes

chorus jonathan russell  charity rose thielen
do you remember every block
every minute of every walk we used to take
we were young so many years ago

verse 5 jonathan russell  charity rose thielen
and i think of all this time
that weve wasted with all our fighting
and i cry
just wanna die with the one i love
beside me
see the head and the heart liveget tickets as low as 58you might also likeverse 6 jonathan russell charity rose thielen  josiah johnson
someday you said
someday you will miss my head
lyin next to yours
in our marriage bed

chorus jonathan russell  charity rose thielen
do you remember every block
every minute of every walk we used to take
we were young so many years ago

verse 7 jonathan russell  charity rose thielen
oh god i love my vices
but theyve taken me to places
that i never thought id go
and i am ready to be home

verse 8 jonathan russell charity rose thielen  josiah johnson
and i think of every spark
every whisper in the dark
now its time
just wanna die with the one i love
just wanna die with the one i love
just wanna die with the one i love
just wanna die with the one i love
beside me
verse 9 jonathan russell charity rose thielen  josiah johnson
honey come home
my stubborn ways are behind me now2embed
